quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You will have bad times, but they will always wake you up to the stuff you weren't paying attention to.
author: Robin Williams

quote: A good stance and posture reflect a proper state of mind.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: Not doing it is certainly the best way to not getting it.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The only problem we really have is we think we're not supposed to have problems! Problems call us to higher level- - face & solve them now!
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: To arrive at the simplest truth requires years of contemplation.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I am not proud, but I am happy; and happiness blinds, I think, more than pride.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Don't settle, and don't struggle.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The way out is in.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Change is hardest at the beginning, messiest in the middle and best at the end.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
author: Aristotle

quote: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
author: Epictetus

quote: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Exceptional thinkers ignore their critics and go about their business making history.
author: John Eliot

quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine; it is lethal.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The problem happens when we have multiple desires. When we have fuzzy desires. When we want to do ten different things and we're not clear about which is the one we care about.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: Allow motion to equal emotion.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.
author: Alan Watts

quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: It matters not who you love, where you love, why you love, when you love or how you love, it matters only that you love.
author: John Lennon

quote: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
author: Alexander Pope
